channel.title: None of the servers work
channel.description:
-The only server that works is mine. -NO Himachi Servers work. -NO "no-ip" Servers work. -YES I am sure I am entering the correct port and IP. -ALL servers are ALWAYS down. I keep getting "the server must be down" and I have tried about 100 different ones, and Himachi!
Please help!

item.title: None of the servers work
item.dc:creator: @Lemondairy Lemondairy
item.description:
@Lemondairy wrote:

Guys I know how to work Moparscape I’m not an idiot. I change the port accordingly to each one I try, and that has nothing to do with it. I have tried restarting the client and computer.

And Slomi-scape didn’t work.

I doubt this is my computer, it’s brand new and I have checked for viruses, Moparscape is the only program I have had trouble with so far.

Read full topic

if it doesnt work, its your side.[/quote]

item.title: None of the servers work
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Realm Blood Realm
item.description:
@Blood_Realm wrote:

You have probably changed the port to connect to a different server. Go to the webclient and click on File - New Port - Then enter 43594 (This is default port change it to whatever the servers ports are).

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
